title: Russia Says Itâ€™s Suspending Participation in Grain Deal With Ukraine
description: The Russian Defense Ministry said Moscow was halting participation in the United Nations-brokered agreement after what it said was a Ukrainian attack on its Black Sea Fleet in Crimea.
dc:creator: The New York Times

media:description: Steel tank barricades known as hedgehogs in Kyiv on Friday.
